name: Densha de Go! 64
overview: Densha de Go! 64 is a train driving simulation game. It's the only game that works with the special N64 version train driving controller which simulates actual train controls, and one of two games that uses Nintendo 64’s “Voice Recognition Unit” or “VRS” as it is known in Japan. Like Hey You, Pikachu!, it is packaged with or without a microphone (called the Engineer’s Pak).
